00020 #include "reference.h"
00021 
00022 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00023     
00024 // Ruota di ds.theta e trasla di ds.x,ds.y
00025 PolarPoint translateTo(PolarPoint p, Point2od ds) {
00026     return PolarPoint( p.getCartesian().rot(ds.theta) + Point2d(ds));
00027 }
00028 
00029 
00030 // Ruota di ds.theta e trasla di ds.x,ds.y
00031 PPVec translateTo(const PPVec&vec, Point2od ds) {
00032     PPVec temp;
00033     for(size_t a=0;a<vec.size();a++) 
00034         temp.push_back(translateTo(vec[a], ds));
00035     return temp;
00036 }
00037 
00038 Point2d changeRef(Point2od newReference, Point2d p) {
00039     return (p-newReference).rot(-newReference.theta);
00040 }
00041 
00042 PolarPoint changeRef(Point2od newReference, PolarPoint pp) {
00043     return PolarPoint(changeRef(newReference, pp.getCartesian()));
00044 }
00045 
00046 AppliedVector changeRef(Point2od newReference, AppliedVector ov) {
00047     AppliedVector av;
00048     av.where = changeRef(newReference, ov.where);
00049     av.weight = ov.weight;
00050     av.theta = ov.theta - newReference.theta;
00051     return av;
00052 }
00053 
00054 Point2od local2world(Point2od ref, Point2od p) {
00055     Point2d c = ref.point2() + p.rot(ref.theta);
00056     double  t = ref.theta + p.theta;
00057     return Point2od(c,t);
00058 }
00059 
00060 AppliedVector local2world(Point2od ref, AppliedVector p) {
00061     AppliedVector av;
00062     av.where = ref.point2() + p.where.rot(ref.theta);
00063     av.weight = p.weight;
00064     av.theta = p.theta + ref.theta;
00065     return av;
00066 }
